scripts.start: npm install && npm run test && node server.js
scripts.test: cd react-movie-network-aware-components && npm install && npm run build && mkdirp ../builds/react-movie-network-aware-components && cp -r build/* ../builds/react-movie-network-aware-components/
scripts.build: cd cra-device-class-aware-loading && npm install && npm run build && mkdirp ../builds/cra-device-class-aware-loading && cp -r build/* ../builds/cra-device-class-aware-loading/
